```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(far)
library(MASS)
library(pracma)
library(wooldridge)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
A <- matrix(c(1,2,3,6), nrow=2)
print(A)
Rank(A)

GA <- t(A)%*%A
Rank(GA)


```



```{r}
df <- wooldridge::hprice1

glimpse(df)

df %>% ggplot(aes(x=lotsize, y = price)) + geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~as.factor(colonial))

mod1 <- lm(price ~ lotsize + colonial, data =df)

summary(mod1)

temp <- df[,c(4,6)]
A <- as.matrix(cbind(1,temp))
Rank(A)

G <- t(A)%*%A
G

b <- df$price

x <- inv(G)%*%t(A)%*%b
x

summary(mod1)
```
